name: Chess 2: The BETTER Chess
description:
You like Chess? 

You like cute, cube-shaped animals?? 

Well, look no further!

This project was inspired by Oats Jenkins' video on Youtube titled "I Made a BETTER Chess". In their video, they revised the pieces and rules.

This project is that idea, turned into a video game.

Check out their original video below for the full rundown!

Also, check out my devlog of how this game was created.

Finally, if you run into any bugs/glitches, feel free to reach out to contact.tdindie@gmail.com.

FEATURES

  • Themed animal aesthetic
  • Revised pieces with new moves
  • New win condition (Jail squares)
  • New Piece: The Bear (can be controlled by both players)
  • In-Game guide to explain pieces & new rule changes
  • Local Multiplayer only. No Single player mode. (online matchmaking may be added in the future)
